metadataAttributes.Title: The Power of Statistics
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: This is the fourth of seven courses in the Google Advanced Data Analytics Certificate. In this course, you’ll discover how data professionals use statistics to analyze data and gain important insights. You'll explore key concepts such as descriptive and inferential statistics, probability, sampling, confidence intervals, and hypothesis testing. You'll also learn how to use Python for statistical analysis and practice communicating your findings like a data professional.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Statistical Analysis,Python Programming,Effective Communication,Statistical Hypothesis Testing,Probability Distribution,
